title: Letter to the Speaker of the House and President of the Senate Regarding the Apportionment Population for Each State as of April 1, 2020 | The White House
content: Dear Madam Speaker: (Dear Madam President:)Pursuant to title 2, United States Code, section 2a(a), I transmit herewith the statement showing the apportionment population for each State as of April 1, 2020, and the number of Representatives to which each State would be entitled.Sincerely,JOSEPH R. BIDEN JR.
